short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add every url to your Wheesbee favorites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to add every url to your Wheesbee favorites, just clicking on the toolbar button. 
It can be used also right-clicking on a page and allows you to share the favorite with your collegues, if you have an enterprise account.
You can also perform a search on Wheesbee selecting a word and choosing the context you prefer. 

In versions 0.2.x, a new function is available.
You can import in wheesbee your browser favorites (a single bookmark or a folder).
To access this function just click on the browser wheesbee icon.
